 - name: db

 - name: api

    env:
 - name: DB
 value: localhost

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
 name: go-demo-2
 labels:
 type: stack
spec:
 containers:
 - name: db
 image: mongo:3.3
 - name: api-1
 image: vfarcic/go-demo-2
 env:
 - name: DB
 value: localhost
 - name: api-2
 image: vfarcic/go-demo-2
 env:
 - name: DB
 value: localhost  
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
 name: go-demo-2
 labels:
 type: stack
spec:
 containers:
 - name: db
 image: mongo:3.3
 - name: api
 image: vfarcic/go-demo-2
 env:
 - name: DB
 value: localhost
 livenessProbe:
 httpGet:
 path: /this/path/does/not/exist
 port: 8080
 initialDelaySeconds: 5
 timeoutSeconds: 2 # Defaults to 1
 periodSeconds: 5 # Defaults to 10
 failureThreshold: 1 # Defaults to 3  
```
